splashScreen.Purpose of UÃ§urtma: UÃ§urtma is a platform that aims to help students find the financial support they need to make their dreams come true.
splashScreen.UÃ§urtma is decentralized: Ã§eviri > Bunu Ã¶ÄŸrencilerle destekÃ§ileri buluÅŸturarak destek alabilmelerinin garantisini merkeziyetsiz bir ÅŸekilde sunar.
splashScreen.clickHereToDonateAllCampaigns: Now, you can support all campaigns at once! <2>Click here</2> to learn details and support.

problemAndSolution.New solution with blockchain: New generation solution that works with blokchain
problemAndSolution.What was the problem: With the smart contracts developed on the Ethereum network, UÃ§urtma allows students to collect support with cryptocurrencies defined on this network and provide the annual support they set the amount to their bank accounts without paying any extra fee. Thus, while their support is in their own control, the supporters can also follow the student's situation through the platform in a transparent manner.
problemAndSolution.Safe_details: All transactions are performed with digital signatures encrypted by the elliptical curve method in the students digital wallets.
problemAndSolution.Transparent_details: All money transfers can be monitored transparently and supporters can track the achievements of the student they support through the platform.
problemAndSolution.Fast_details: After the completion of the student campaigns, their support is paid to the students quickly on time without any further action. Students never suffer from the human factor which is completely eliminated.

howItWorks.Examine_details: Examine student campaigns, select student who you want to help.
howItWorks.Support_details: Click Support button and take your reference code. Follow instruction and support student.
howItWorks.Follow_details: Follow student's developments and achievements who you support.
howItWorks.Three Steps: You can help to students dream come true in three easy steps.

whatWillProvide.question: What will UÃ§urtma provide me?
whatWillProvide.answer: UÃ§urtma is a platform where students who need support can collect support to cover their expenses. Using the platform, you can safely collect support and meet your needs in the long run.

whatWillProvideDonator.question: What will UÃ§urtma provide me?
whatWillProvideDonator.answer: UÃ§urtma will help you discover the students you will support. It provides you with transparent, auditable and safe platform to access students in need.

howApply.question: How should I apply?
howApply.answer: You can make a pre-application with your photo, personal information and student certificate which you can access from e-devlet. Thus, we can confirm the accuracy of this information and then create the campaign page where you can gather support together.

howEvaluate.question: How will my application be evaluated?
howEvaluate.answer: As UÃ§urtma, we believe that every student should have equal opportunities. Therefore, our evaluation after the application only aims to check the accuracy of the applications. All students whose accuracy we have approved will be allowed to create a campaign.

gettingSupport.question: How do I get support?
gettingSupport.answer: Payments are transferred to your BiLira wallet every 28 days. After that, you can transfer this money to your own bank account with your BiLira account or spend it on companies that work with BiLira.

gettingPayment.question: How will the payments be made?
gettingPayment.answer: You can receive payments by transferring them to your wallet over the Ethereum network. This is an important process for securing the money and for controlling your money.
